Arvada.Sports Authority Field at Mile High: Sports Authority Field at Mile High, previously known as Invesco Field at Mile High, and commonly known as Mile High or Mile High Stadium, is an American football stadium located in Denver, Colorado. The field is named after a sponsor and the stadium is named Mile High, due to the city of Denver's noted altitude of 5,280 feet. The stadium's primary tenant is the Denver Broncos of the National Football League (NFL).
